search_input:
3. TEXT EDITOR

*A text editor is a program that lets you edit and modify text files. It is often used for writing and editing code, documents, and other types of plain text files. A good text editor should have features like syntax highlighting, code completion, and a comfortable interface.*
suggested_query: A text editor is a program that lets you edit and modify text files. It is often used for writing and editing code, documents, and other types of plain text files. A good text editor should have features like syntax highlighting, code completion, and a comfortable interface.
